description.oldValue:
,The new Viva Admin experience rolled out to all users December 14th and can be found via search (Search for Viva) or in the setup tab in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center. New admin experiences for Viva Topics, Connections, and Engage are expected to rollout in the coming months!
GA date: December CY2022
Preview date: October CY2022
description.newValue: ,The new Viva Admin experience rolled out to all users December 14th and can be found via search (Search for Viva) or in the setup tab in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center. New admin experiences for Viva Topics, Connections, and Engage are expected to rollout in the coming months!
